name: A tiny mage's descent into the dark depths of a dungeon
name_original: A tiny mage's descent into the dark depths of a dungeon
description:
A least viable product for 7DRL

Will receive future updates but this is it for now.

WASD to move

LMB to shoot

Reach the end to win

All assets & code by me

Note: if you want to play the original 7DRL game then download the windows with debug file
